meanings.definition: The quality or state of being full of leaves.
meanings.sent1: The forest's leafinesses create a beautiful green canopy.
meanings.sent2: I love the leafinesses of this park in the fall.
meanings.sent3: The leafinesses of the tree made it a perfect spot for a picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her garden's leafinesses were like a lush, natural carpet.
meanings.sent5: The leafinesses of the plants danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a lot of leaves.
meanings.sent1: The leafinesses of the tree provide ample shade in summer.
meanings.sent2: The leafinesses of the bushes make them perfect hiding spots.
meanings.sent3: The leafinesses of the plant seemed to grow overnight.
meanings.sent4: The leafinesses of the forest whispered secrets in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The leafinesses of the branches rustled softly in the breeze.
